transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ha sir.
Executive: Yes good morning Vaibhav bol raha hu mai IndiaMART account manager.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Sir aapke ye Matri exports ke against na ek complaint aayi thi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ek buyer ki so matlab aap ye resolve karane ko sir matlab IndiaMART ne mujhe bola hai ki aap inki cheez ek baar matlab sir thoda sa aapko pata hai is issue ke bare mein matlab jo aap complaint aayi hai.
Customer: Nahi kya complaint hai.
Executive: Actually ek energy minerals karke company hai share se right and share se hai share karke city hai koi energy minerals ka naam hai aur aapka matlab ye matlab bola gaya hai ki ek second na ki unpack video se four crystals broken char crystal broken the and full clear type laser crystal 21 is broken which is sideways slightly broken that kind of crystal we can't use for healing I send video she is talking argued that is not broken link and talk and talk like rude I am lying.
Executive: To 23505 ka dispute hai isko please aap ek baar baat karke issue resolve kara lijiye sir IndiaMART se matlab matlab sir visibility maintain rakhne ke liye buyer supply conflict tickets resolved hone chahiye to ek baar aap please inse contact me aa jaiye and ek baar baat kar lijiye dekh sakte ho koi hum mutual resolution me aa sakte hai kya.
Customer: Nahi sir ek second rukta hu ek baat karne ka humko koi problem nahi hai kisi bhi customer se ek aapne ye dekho ek issue mere ko complaint nahi pata hai wo bachi ko pata hoga wo hum kar bhi lenge lekin hamari taraf se ek aapka jo phone aaya tha ek puchna tha ki jaise company ke system hai ki ek cheez hum aapko product sale kar rahe hain usme hum mention karte hain ki jo bhi cheez aap loge to unpack video is compulsory jaise humne sahi tarike se pack karke aapko bheja hai jiska hamare pass CCTV footage hai ki kis tarah se humne product aapko pack karke bheji hai aur kisi bhi wajah se jaise courier me maal jata hai bhaiya kabhi pahuchta hai pahuchta hai hum isko safely pack karwate hai safely boxing karte hai sara safely pack karte hai fir bhi unfortunately percent percent me aisa ho jata hai ki koi bhi product tut sakti hai ek ye possibility hai to hum customer ko bolte hai ki aap uska koi bhi parcel hamara aapke waha aaye to unpack video is compulsory is necessary.
Executive: Unpack video right.
Customer: Second thing unpack video second thing ki jaise koi customer aise hote hai ki jaise koi cheez usne nikali aur kisi wajah se tuti hum nahi jante ki actually genuinely tuti hai between pahuchne tak tuti hai ya usse tuti hai ab jaise parcel pahuchta hai usko monday usko delivery pahuchi hai monday ko customer humko complaint karta hai tuesday ko ki bhai aapka parcel me ye damage hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: To hum unko bolte hai ki aapko parcel pahucha hai monday ko aap humko complaint kar rahe ho tuesday ko to ye in between transit hua.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ha do din baad samjho for example batao ye sari baat apni ho rahi hai for example ke taur pe.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Jaise monday ko parcel party party ke waha monday ko parcel pahuch raha hai aur uski complaint aati hai hamara phone aata hai ya message aata hai tuesday ko to jaise parcel pahuchne se inki sign bhi hoti hai courier me jata hai courier sign karwate courier wale aur usme wo hota hai jaise wo unka jo hota hai na.
Customer: Usme update bhi hota hai ki aapki party ke waha wo parcel pahuch gaya hai to courier wala uski sign bhi leta hai ki ye jo party delivery leti hai uska sign bhi hota hai ye sare proof ho gaye.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Ab jaise customer humko complaint karta hai tuesday ko ki aapka maal humko tuta hua mila hai to hum uske regarding hum kya kar sakte hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Nahi sir dekhiye aapko ek baar isme discussion to karna padega buyer se okay matlab jo bhi hai kyuki complaint raised hai yaha pe I don't know matlab kya hai isme dekhiye mere ko to ye rehta hai client ko samjhana matlab ek ek mail bhi abhi aapko karunga mai matlab jisme matlab wo buyer wo resolution kaise kaise hota hai IndiaMART me meanwhile sir mujhe ye bola gaya hai ki seller se ye detail le le kya hai ye ek aadhar card aapka sir right aur ek cancelled check lagta hai aapka and ye kaun kaun mang raha hai ye.
Customer: IndiaMART.
Executive: IndiaMART mang raha hai okay IndiaMART problem hai sir matlab aapko isliye apne recorded line se phone kar raha apne personal number se nahi phone kar raha hu kyuki yaha pe ticket raised hai right aapke pass mera personal number hoga so ek kam karta hu sir ek kam karta hu ye hai na specific issue hai na wo sari meri bachi handle karti hai to mere ko ye aap jaise legally baat kar rahe ho to mere ko legally kam karna padega.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To aise legally mere ko kya karna hai isme legally aap bataiye wo legally wo karunga wo mera personal jo problem hai wo personal side pe rakh ke uski baat ko abhi discuss bhi nahi karna hai.
Executive: To abhi sir IndiaMART ke perspective se to sir please aapko ek baar matlab abhi abhi ya jab aapko thoda sa ek baar thoda sa on priority please leke ek baar buyer se connect kar lijiye hai na matlab jo bhi hai kyuki yaha pe ticket raised hai to buyer ne proof share kiya hai IndiaMART ko.
Customer: Aap kar sakte ho sir ek kam kar sakte ho ek mere ko 10 minute se 10 minute baad aap call back kar sakte ho sir seedha main bachi se hi baat karwa deta hu.
Executive: Kitne kab kitne time baad.
Customer: Jaise ye 10:25 hua hai aap 10:45 ko call kar lo main bachi se baat karunga kyuki sara legal wo procedures wagera kyuki hamara bhi pura registered company hai sir aisa nahi hai ki koi aise hi kam chala rahe hai aapki to purani company hai.
Executive: Genuine question hai nahi to legally koi problem hai to legally isko jawab denge agar wo kyuki koi buyer hai kyuki sir samjho ki IndiaMART ho 1000 buyers ke calls aate hai 1000 buyers se product jati hai 1000 buyers se wo rehti hai to ab ka hazaro percent ka particular dimag rehta hai aur particular dimag satisfy karna to wo ek company ki to possibility hai nahi single person ki ye samne one person hai aur problem hai hazaro logo ko.
Executive: Hmm aapke aapke liye to kafi matlab I think first complaint hi hai ab meri sir dekhiye mera job role rehta hai ki client ko thoda sa matlab bataye ki jo cheeze batana jaruri hai wo aapko bata deta hu sir ki yaha pe dekhiye ek matlab aapko ek sir ek polite warning bhi jati hai client ko ki matlab repeated BS conflicts aate hai sir to matlab service stop hoti hai but aapka first hai shayad 12 mahine me to mere hisab se to aap ek complaints aate rehte hai seller ke against hai na so matlab it is a thing but aap please isko sir ek baar on priority please leke ek baar dekh lijiye aap client pe baki mai aapko ek baar aapke matlab aapke.
Customer: Nahi nahi sir dekho single reason hai genuine complaint hai hum 100% refund policy rakhte hai sir kya rakhte hai 100% refund policy isme keval hamari ek condition hai ki unboxing video is compulsory.
Executive: Yes.
Customer: Kyuki condition se sir product customer se tuti hai transit transit tuti hai transit responsible for this any other packaging issue agar agar transit me tut abhi dekhiye ek legal team bhi aapko matlab IndiaMART ki legal team isme involve hoti hai sir okay matlab aapko mai pura process bata de raha as an account manager mera kam hai aapko pehle se bata nahi nahi ye bol raha hu aap mere se baat karoge.
Customer: Ye koi repetition bachi se hogi isliye sure hai ki wo genuine person janta hai ab jaise hi wo jisko usko perfect knowledge nahi hai aap mere ko bataoge main aadha sununga aadha clear nahi sununga isse acha hai ki mere ko bhi samajh me aayega mere ko further kya kya follow kar rahe hai jaise 10 20 follow kar rahe hai hum particularly ab do teen cheeze jaruri hai hum nahi follow kar rahe wo bhi hum dekh lenge sir hamari taraf se best try rahega customer satisfaction is the best policy for our.
Executive: Yes yes yes exactly exactly.
Customer: 100% baaten to mai kya keh raha hu aap sir 1045 matlab 10:45 baje aap call kar lijiye main bachi se puri baat kar leta hu aur usko pura humko bhi samajh me bhaiya kyuki customer one side dekhta hai abhi customer ka mai aapko bhejunga usne jo rudely behave kiya hai sir hamari taraf se 100% satisfy karne ki koshish ki gayi hamare taraf se sare proof diye gaye sare jo hai wo personal me kare wo baad me discuss karenge to aise customer ke behavior se hum bhi pareshan ho jate hai sir.
Executive: Nahi mai samajh raha hu sir matlab aise issues aate hai business hai sir business me to aayega hi and koi nahi mai aapko 20 minute baad mai.
Customer: Iske baad stop karenge iske regarding customer ke kyuki wo galat complaint hamare waha dal denge lekin humko bhi to kuch protect rakhna padega nahi ki jaise hum 100% sahi hai aur customer unke hisab se kuch galat hua hai to jo sari baad me dekhte hai abhi iska iska call karte hai theek hai sir.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul mai aapko connect karta hu.
Customer: Okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a complaint about broken crystals.

- Executive needs seller details for resolution.

- Customer wants to discuss legally with executive.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the complaint details.

- Executive asked to connect with the buyer.

- Agreed to discuss with the daughter at 10:45 AM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 10:45 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- complaint, resolution, refund policy, unboxing video
